div.p: All authors conceived the study. X.G., G.K. and G.L. designed the modelling simulations; X.G. performed the model simulations. X.G., G.K. and G.L. analysed the model results. X.G., L.L.J., G.L., R.T., J.J.Z. and X.F.S. discussed the model-data intercomparison. X.G., L.L.J. G.L. and G.K. led the write up of the manuscript. All authors interpreted the results and contributed to the final version of the manuscript.
